attributes.action: Impose a fixed penalty of £1000 against any company employing someone who is caught using their mobile phone illegally whilst driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent increase in penalty for illegally using a mobile phone whilst driving seems to have had some effect on the commuters that I pass each day.  
However it looks like it has had no affect whatsoever on the number of van and lorry drivers who use their phones.  
This law would make employers liable to a fine of £1000 for any of their workers who are caught using their phones illegally whilst driving on company time.  
Hopefully it would make them think twice before breaking the law and annoying me.
